name: Edward DORIA, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Records Department, Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Doria v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
parties: Edward DORIA, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Records Department, Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appellees’ Motion to Quash Reply Brief of Appellant is denied. The Order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Arthur R. Thomas, Pennsylvania Bd. of Probation and Parole, K. Scott Roy, Joseph D. Lehman, Com’rs Dept, of Corrections, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Edward DORIA, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Records Department, Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Sept. 22, 1994.
Decided Dec. 28, 1994.
Michael Lemer, for appellant.
Arthur R. Thomas, Pennsylvania Bd. of Probation and Parole, K. Scott Roy, Joseph D. Lehman, Com’rs Dept, of Corrections, for appellees.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
